code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import Navbar from'./common/Navbar';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AccountSettings=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[newUsername,setNewUsername]=useState('');const[avatar,setAvatar]=useState(null);const[newAvatar,setNewAvatar]=useState(null);const[oldPassword,setOldPassword]=useState('');const[newPassword,setNewPassword]=useState('');const[confirmNewPassword,setConfirmNewPassword]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[passwordsMatch,setPasswordsMatch]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const
